get.description: This endpoint lets you retrieve all the details of an item.

parameters.name: account_id
parameters.description: Your Kissflow <<glossary:Account ID>>. This is a mandatory parameter.

parameters.name: case_id
parameters.description: Your Kissflow <<glossary:Case ID>>. This is a mandatory parameter.

parameters.name: item_id
parameters.description: Your unique <<glossary:Item ID>>. This is a mandatory parameter.

200.description: This request retrieves all the details of a specific item.

delete.description: This endpoint lets you delete an item from the case system.

parameters.name: account_id
parameters.description: ID of account

parameters.name: case_id
parameters.description: ID of a case system

parameters.name: item_id
parameters.description: ID of the item to be deleted

200.description: Delete a specific item

post.description: This endpoint lets you update the custom form fields in a case system.

parameters.name: account_id
parameters.description: ID of account

parameters.name: case_id
parameters.description: ID of a case system

parameters.name: item_id
parameters.description: ID of the item

parameters.name: status_id
parameters.description: ID of the current status

requestBody.description: Payload to update custom form fields

200.description: This request updates the status of custom form fields in a case system.

400.description: The parameters specified in the payload are invalid.

500.description: The value specified for one of the custom form fields is invalid.

post.description: This endpoint lets you change the status of an item in the case system.
post.summary: Update the status of an item

parameters.name: account_id
parameters.description: This is your Kissflow <<glossary:Account ID>>, and is a mandatory parameter.

parameters.name: case_id
parameters.description: Your Kissflow <<glossary:Case ID>>. This is a mandatory parameter.

parameters.name: item_id
parameters.description: ID of the item

parameters.name: status_id
parameters.description: ID of the current status

200.description: This request changes the status of an item in the case system.

400.description: The parameters specified in the payload are invalid.

post.description: This endpoint lets you change the assignee of an item in the case system.
post.summary: Update the assignee for an item

parameters.name: account_id
parameters.description: This is your Kissflow <<glossary:Account ID>>, and is a mandatory parameter.

parameters.name: case_id
parameters.description: Your Kissflow <<glossary:Case ID>>. This is a mandatory parameter.

parameters.name: item_id
parameters.description: ID of the item

parameters.name: status_id
parameters.description: ID of the current status

200.description: This request changes the assignee of an item in the case system.

400.description: The parameters specified in the payload are invalid. The value specified for Assignee is invalid.

put.description: This endpoint lets you update the due date (date and time) for an item in the case system.
put.summary: Update the due date and time for an item

parameters.name: account_id
parameters.description: ID of account

parameters.name: case_id
parameters.description: ID of a case system

parameters.name: item_id
parameters.description: ID of the item

parameters.name: status_id
parameters.description: ID of the current status

requestBody.description: Payload to update due date (date and time)

200.description: This request updates the due date (date and time) of an item in the case system.

400.description: The parameters specified in the payload are invalid.

put.description: This endpoint lets you update the priority for an item in the case system.

parameters.description: ID of account

parameters.name: case_id

parameters.name: item_id
parameters.description: ID of the item

parameters.name: status_id
parameters.description: ID of the current status

200.description: This request updates the priority of an item in the case system.

400.description: The parameters specified in the payload are invalid.

put.description: This endpoint lets you update the requester for an item in the case system.

parameters.name: account_id

parameters.name: case_id

parameters.description: ID of the current status

post.description: This endpoint lets you add watcher(s) to a case.

parameters.name: account_id
parameters.description: This is your Kissflow <<glossary:Account ID>>, and is a mandatory parameter.

parameters.name: case_id
parameters.description: Your Kissflow <<glossary:Case ID>>. This is a mandatory parameter.

parameters.name: item_id
parameters.description: System generated ID of this case.

requestBody.description: Payload to add watcher(s) to a case.

200.description: Watcher(s) added successfully to your case.

400.description: The parameters specified in the payload to add watchers to a case are invalid.

406.description: The maximum number of watchers that can be assigned to your case has been reached.

post.description: This endpoint lets you retrieve the list of watchers for a case in your case system.
post.summary: Get list of watchers for a case

parameters.name: account_id
parameters.description: This is your Kissflow <<glossary:Account ID>>, and is a mandatory parameter.

parameters.name: case_id
parameters.description: Your Kissflow <<glossary:Case ID>>. This is a mandatory parameter.

parameters.name: item_id
parameters.description: System generated ID of this case.

200.description: The list of watchers for your case was retrieved successfully.

400.description: The parameters specified in the payload to retrieve watchers of a case are invalid.

post.description: This endpoint lets you remove watcher(s) from a case.

parameters.name: account_id
parameters.description: This is your Kissflow <<glossary:Account ID>>, and is a mandatory parameter.

parameters.name: case_id
parameters.description: Your Kissflow <<glossary:Case ID>>. This is a mandatory parameter.

parameters.name: item_id
parameters.description: System generated ID of this case.

requestBody.description: Payload to remove watcher(s) from a case.

200.description: The watcher(s) were successfully removed from your case.

400.description: The parameters specified in the payload to remove watchers from a case are invalid.

get.description: This endpoint lets you retrieve the status transitions of an item in a case system.

parameters.description: ID of account

parameters.name: case_id
parameters.description: ID of a case system

parameters.name: item_id
parameters.description: ID of an item

200.description: This request lists the status transitions of an item in a case system.

get.summary: Get the activities of a item
get.description: This endpoint lets you retrieve activities of a specific item in your case.

parameters.name: account_id
parameters.description: Your Kissflow <<glossary:Account ID>>. This is a mandatory parameter.

parameters.name: case_id
parameters.description: Your unique Kissflow <<glossary:Case ID>>. This is a mandatory parameter.

parameters.name: item_id
parameters.description: Your Kissflow Case's unique <<glossary:Item ID>>. This is a mandatory parameter.

200.description: This request successfully retrieves activities of a specific item.

post.description: This endpoint lets your retrieve the number of items in a view based on a filter.
post.summary: Retrieve the number of items in a view

parameters.name: account_id
parameters.description: ID of account

parameters.name: case_id
parameters.description: ID of a case system

requestBody.description: Payload to display specific columns and apply selected filter conditions

200.description: Get count of items in a view after a filter is applied.

post.description: This endpoint lets you bulk-update assignee for items.

parameters.name: account_id
parameters.description: ID of account

parameters.name: case_id
parameters.description: ID of a case system

requestBody.description: Payload to bulk-update assignee for items

200.description: Perform bulk-update of assignee for items

400.description: The value for AssignedTo is missing in the payload.

post.description: This endpoint lets you bulk-update status for items.

parameters.name: account_id
parameters.description: ID of account

parameters.name: case_id
parameters.description: ID of a case system

requestBody.description: Payload to bulk-update status for items

200.description: Perform bulk-update of status for items.

400.description: The value for_status_id is missing in the payload.

post.description: This endpoint lets you bulk-update priority for items.

parameters.name: account_id
parameters.description: ID of account

parameters.name: case_id
parameters.description: ID of a case system

200.description: Perform bulk-update of priority for items.

400.description: The value for_priority_id is missing in the payload.

post.description: This endpoint lets you bulk-delete items from the case system.

parameters.name: account_id
parameters.description: ID of account

parameters.name: case_id
parameters.description: ID of a case system

200.description: Perform bulk-deletion of items.

post.description: This endpoint lets you add an attachment to an attachment field in the case form. The following file formats are supported - pdf, .doc, .ppt, .xls, .jpg, .jpeg, .jpe, .png, .gif, or .mp4.
post.summary: Upload an attachment to an attachment field

parameters.name: account_id
parameters.description: This is your Kissflow <<glossary:Account ID>>, and is a mandatory parameter.

parameters.name: case_id
parameters.description: The <<glossary:Case ID>> is a unique identifier for each case system, and is a mandatory parameter.

parameters.name: item_id
parameters.description: The <<glossary:Instance ID>> is a unique identifier for an individual item, and is a mandatory parameter.

parameters.name: field_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier assigned to each field of your case form. This is a mandatory parameter.

200.description: This request adds a new attachment to an attachment field in the case form.

post.description: This endpoint lets you upload an attachment to an attachment field in a table in the case form. The following file formats are supported - pdf, .doc, .ppt, .xls, .jpg, .jpeg, .jpe, .png, .gif, or .mp4.
post.summary: Upload an attachment to an attachment field in a table table field

parameters.name: account_id
parameters.description: This is your Kissflow <<glossary:Account ID>>, and is a mandatory parameter.

parameters.name: case_id
parameters.description: The <<glossary:Case ID>> is a unique identifier for each case system, and is a mandatory parameter.

parameters.name: item_id
parameters.description: The <<glossary:Instance ID>> is a unique identifier for an individual item, and is a mandatory parameter.

parameters.name: table_id
parameters.description: This is a unique identifier assigned to each table in your case form. This is a mandatory parameter.

parameters.name: row_id
parameters.description: This is a unique identifier assigned to each row of a table in your case form. This is a mandatory parameter.

parameters.name: field_id
parameters.description: This is a unique identifier assigned to each column of a table in your case form. This is a mandatory parameter.

200.description: This request uploads an attachment to an attachent field in a table in the case form.

post.description: This endpoint lets you upload an image file to an image field in the case form. The following file formats are supported - .jpg, .jpeg, .jpe, .png, or .gif.

get.description: This endpoint lets you retrieve all the fields in a case system.

parameters.description: ID of account

parameters.name: case_id
parameters.description: ID of a case system

200.description: List all the fields in a case system.

get.description: This endpoint retrieves all fields from another flow using a lookup field.
get.summary: Retrieve all fields using a lookup field

parameters.name: account_id
parameters.description: ID of account

parameters.name: case_id
parameters.description: ID of the case system whose fields are required

200.description: This request lists all the fields from another flow using a lookup field.

get.description: This endpoint lets you retrieve all the fields from a table in another flow while using a lookup field.
get.summary: Retrieve all fields from a table using a lookup field

parameters.name: account_id
parameters.description: ID of account

parameters.name: case_id
parameters.description: ID of a case system

parameters.name: table_id
parameters.description: ID of the child table whose fields are required

get.description: This endpoint retrieves a list of items in another flow and populate it in a lookup field added in the case form.
get.summary: Retrieve a list of items and populate them in a lookup field

parameters.name: account_id
parameters.description: ID of account

parameters.name: case_id
parameters.description: ID of a case system

parameters.name: item_id
parameters.description: ID of the item that is looking up data

parameters.name: field_id
parameters.description: ID of the lookup field that will populate data from another flow

parameters.name: page_number
parameters.description: This is the specific page number of an item list. The page number can be specified as 1, 2, 3, etc.

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: The number of items that can be listed in a page. It can be assigned any integer.

parameters.name: q
parameters.description: The search filter string

200.description: This request retrieves a list of items in another flow and populates it in a lookup field added in the case form.

get.description: This endpoint retrieves a list of items from another flow and populates it in a lookup field added in a table in the case form.
get.summary: Retrieve a list of items and populate them in a lookup field in a table

parameters.name: case_id
parameters.description: ID of a case system

parameters.name: item_id
parameters.description: ID of the item that is looking up data

parameters.name: table_id
parameters.description: ID of the table that contains the lookup field

parameters.name: table_instance_id
parameters.description: ID of the row in a table that contains the lookup field

parameters.name: field_id
parameters.description: ID of the lookup field that will populate data from another flow

parameters.name: page_number
parameters.description: This is the specific page number of an item list. The page number can be specified as 1, 2, 3, etc.

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: The number of items that can be listed in a page. It can be assigned any integer.

parameters.name: q
parameters.description: The search filter string

200.description: This request retrieves a list of items from another flow and populates it in a lookup field added in a table in the case form.

get.description: This endpoint lets you retrieve a list of items external source and populates it in a remote lookup field added in the case form.

parameters.name: account_id
parameters.description: ID of account

parameters.name: case_id
parameters.description: ID of a case system

parameters.name: item_id
parameters.description: ID of the item that is looking up data

parameters.name: field_id
parameters.description: ID of the remote lookup field that will populate data from an external source

parameters.name: q
parameters.description: The search filter string

200.description: This request retrieves a list of items from an external source and populates it in a remote lookup field added in the case form.

get.description: This endpoint retrieves a list of items from an external source and populates it in a remote lookup field added in a table in the case form.
get.summary: Retrieve a list of items and populate them in a remote lookup field in a table

parameters.name: account_id
parameters.description: ID of account

parameters.name: case_id
parameters.description: ID of a case system

parameters.name: item_id
parameters.description: ID of the item that is looking up data

parameters.name: table_id
parameters.description: ID of the table that contains the lookup field

parameters.name: table_instance_id
parameters.description: ID of the row in a table that contains the lookup field

parameters.description: ID of the remote lookup field that will populate data from another flow

tags.name: Case
tags.description: Create and manage Case in Kissflow using these API endpoints.

NotAuthorized.description: The client request has not been completed because it lacks valid authentication credentials for the requested resource.

Forbidden.description: The server understands the request but refuses to authorize it.
